Nov. 17, 2007 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-third-section
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Flugel Horn - Crosskeys Best Horn Section: City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Prizes - 1st £300, 2nd £190, 3rd £130. 3 bands competed
2007 Welsh League Champions: Crosskeys Runners Up: Seindorf Arian Crwbin
Aug. 12, 2015, 1:38 a.m. July 2, 2020, 9:56 a.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter
2 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
3 Crwbin Silver Band Ceri John
Withdrawn Ebbw Vale Band Ceri Thomas
